channel.title: Comments on: HBO Buys Second Life Film

item.title: By: Quzor
item.dc:creator: Quzor
item.description: No offense to anyone who plays Second Life (though you'll probably take offense), but I suggest you find a more appropriate and benefitial way to spend your hard earned dollars. FFS, I can't believe this game even warrants a movie...hell I can't even believe it's a successful game...
item.content:encoded: No offense to anyone who plays Second Life (though you’ll probably take offense), but I suggest you find a more appropriate and benefitial way to spend your hard earned dollars. FFS, I can’t believe this game even warrants a movie…hell I can’t even believe it’s a successful game…

item.title: By: Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: Something about it...Second Life is very disturbing to me. It's one thing that I spend 30 hours a week running a gnome around with 9-24 other people, but at least I don't believe I "am" the gnome...but to each their own I guess.
item.content:encoded: Something about it…Second Life is very disturbing to me. It’s one thing that I spend 30 hours a week running a gnome around with 9-24 other people, but at least I don’t believe I “am” the gnome…but to each their own I guess.

item.title: By: DM Osbon
item.dc:creator: DM Osbon
item.description: sounds like crass sh*t...only in america springs to mind!
item.content:encoded: sounds like crass sh*t…only in america springs to mind!
